name: Seagull Express
description:
Welcome to Seagull Express! You are a seagull that is employed at Seagull Express. Pick up orders and deliver them readily to our customers. Make sure you do not break the package! Avoid running into clouds and hitting eagles or the customers will be upset. What happens when customers are not happy? We lose income! We do not want that to happen so be sure to watch out.

Have a safe flight!

Instructions:

Pick up packages from the package center at Seagull Express. Each package has information on it that indicates where the customer is located, the delivery fee, etc. Beware! Picking up more orders will make you tired so you won't fly as fast! If you would like to become a top-notch deliveryman, you need to deliver the packages safely and use that income to purchase upgrades!
